item.title: Tepepa
item.description: Tepepa, also known as Blood and Guns, is an Italian epic Zapata Western film starring Tomas Milian and Orson Welles. The film was directed by Giulio Petroni. It was co-produced with Spain, where the film was released with the title Tepepa... Viva La Revolución.

item.title: A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof
item.description: A Sky Full of Stars for a Roof is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western comedy film.

item.title: Death Rides a Horse
item.description: Death Rides a Horse is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western directed by Giulio Petroni, written by Luciano Vincenzoni and starring Lee Van Cleef and John Phillip Law.

item.title: Life Is Tough
item.description: Life Is Tough, Eh Providence? is a 1972 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western comedy film directed by Giulio Petroni. The film was a box office success and generated an immediate sequel, Here We Go Again, Eh Providence?.
